title: LeBlanc Mains
body: FOR ALL LEBLANC MAINS (INCLUDING ME)  {{champion:7}}, WE R GOING TO MAYBE STOP PLAYING HER BECASUE OF THE ASSASSIN REWORK. HER W, AS RIOT SAYS MIGHT, GET A DEALY TO CAST BACK WHICH IS HEART BRAKING CASUE WE CANT TURRET DIVE. PLEASE RIOT DONT DO THIS

replies.body: Well if you played a proper champ to begin with, you wouldn't be having this problem.
OK! i realise how busted she is and yh i need a bigger champ pool.
she a busted champ and deserves a nerd get use to it m8,Rengar mains got the same fate with the first rework and might get it again with the new one

You can find the Caps Lock key on the left side of the keyboard, below Tab and above Shift.
I think you bumped it.
